name: BAI YUN® Anti UV General Purpose Sealant Neutral Cure Silicone Caulk
description: BAI YUN® Anti UV General Purpose Sealant Neutral Cure Silicone Caulk SS850 General Purpose Silicone Sealant is one-component, neutral curing, general purpose construction silicone sealant with good adhesion to glass, aluminum, cement, concrete etc., specially designed for sealing in all type door ,window and wall joints.
